TopicTitle: Craft disassembles on time warp (not physics warp)

Articles.Content:
**EDIT: Nevermind, I restarted the game and it isn't happening. :/**

The craft is pulled apart on time warp.

Output log:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/14jm76kd86wdpvu/output_log.txt?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/14jm76kd86wdpvu/output_log.txt?dl=0)

Save file:

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/krlnykkycxs6o3f/Whatever%20you%20do%2C%20don%27t%20warp.sfs?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/krlnykkycxs6o3f/Whatever%20you%20do%2C%20don%27t%20warp.sfs?dl=0)

Steps to reproduce:

Load save, time warp e.g. 5x and watch the craft stretch and come apart.

I have Kerbal Alarm Clock 3.2.4.0 installed and I have the current version of the game distributed via Steam (up-to-date).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T04:54:16Z" title="05/01/2015 04:54  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by THX1138**
